content:
/>
IX.iii.1.E.3.
d
.
Estranged Married Veterans
If two Veterans married to one another are estranged but one Veteran is making a reasonable contribution to the support of the other, the combined pension rate applies.
Note
:  When two Veterans married to one another are estranged and neither Veteran is reasonably contributing to the other’s support, the combined pension rate does
not
apply.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Pension - Basic Rate Determinations
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E
